```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::knit_hooks$set(crop = knitr::hook_pdfcrop)

if (identical(knitr:::pandoc_to(), 'latex'))
  knitr::knit_hooks$set(plot = knitr::hook_plot_tex)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  dev = "pdf",
  dev.args = list(pointsize = 8),
  crop = TRUE,
  fig.width = 5,
  fig.height = 3
)

knitr::opts_knit$set(width = 50)

options(digits = 3)
```
